ygData.subject: RE: Time for a new weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: ok=) I can usually tell if it is your wife, cuz I usually get ignored when I say hi;) So, when you answer next time, ill ask ... From: Garramone, Michael
ygData.messageBody:
ok=)
I can usually tell if it is your wife, cuz I usually get ignored when I say
hi;)
So, when you answer next time, ill ask

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 6:04 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Time for a new weapon


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

aye i was, that was during a week or so very bored time. now my wife mostly
plays and not me, so i'm only on very little late at night after i get my
baby to bed and i usually just sit in town hehe. so if you catch me then,
maybe we can go do it for a bit.

Shada

>
> From: "Josh Moore" <josh@...>
>
